subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur, who will turn 40 on May 6, acrobatically stopped 26 shots and set a playoff record with his 24th shutout in the Devils’ Game 4 win at home.
snippet: Martin Brodeur, who will turn 40 on May 6, acrobatically stopped 26 shots and set a playoff record with his 24th shutout in the Devils’ Game 4 win at home.
